title: Why is class 11 maths tougher than class 10 maths? - Quora

response.answer_text: Before last year, the change in format from CCE in class 10 to without CCE curriculum in class 11 was one of the major factors.The syllabi is vast and more detailed in every subject. Class 10 syllabus is relatively easier to memorize and for rote learning. Application of practical knowledge is observed to be more.Class 11 provides the base for your subjects in class 12. Therefore, you are required to actually understand and put an effort to apply concepts in most subjects.Psychologically speaking, since you choose a set of preferred subjects by choosing your stream. A student becomes more conscious about what subjects he/she is interested in. Knowing that you need to make further study and crucial career choices based on class 11 and 12, increases it’s weightage.Key points and advices for a Commerce student from personal experience: Maths does become tougher and better. It’s more interesting in class 11 and you’ll be introduced to a whole new outlook. Do not give up on the subject. No matter what you hear, this is one subject you cannot afford to lose in touch with in class 11. Primary reason being that you cannot make it up in class 12.Accountancy is an interesting, application-based subject. You’ll come across chapters and topics you would love and dislike. Make sure your concepts are clear at the end of the day. That is enough to get you going.Business studies is a great subject and one of the easiest. You can take it lightly at points however, understand chapters like Business Services, Formation of A Company, Sources of Finance, Forms of An Organisation. Class 12 Business Studies has it’s roots in these chapters.Economics is more like History for those who are studying Indian Economic Development. You can take it slow according to your interests. Don’t worry, class 12 Economics is far more interesting.Do work on your creative writing and comprehension skills in class 11. Most importantly, practice poetry comprehensions and Writing Skills to get your base strong.
